title: TOP FLOOR! Bright 2 Bedroom in Quaint Building // Steps from the Lake
app_fee: $30 application fee per person over 18 years of age
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW!', 'Wellington Property Company is pleased to offer our bright & generously-sized 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom apartment in a beautifully maintained 6-unit building located within steps of Lake Merritt!', 'Situated on the second floor and elevated above street level, this classic 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment has original hardwood floors throughout; living room; kitchen featuring a dishwasher, gas range, refrigerator, tons of cabinets & backdoor access; a white claw-foot bathtub; and plenty of closet space!', 'Boasting a 91 Walk Score and the coveted “Walkers Paradise” designation, residents of 501 Wesley enjoy all the amenities of the lake; the Cleveland Cascade steps; neighborhood favorites like Grand Lake Kitchen, Trader Joes, Peet’s Coffee and more.', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '- Classic 2 Bedroom 1 Bath', '- ~850 square feet', '- Secure entry', '- Original hardwood floors throughout', '- Fresh paint throughout', '- Multiple wood-framed windows for natural sunlight', '- Great closet space', '- Kitchen: dishwasher, gas range, refrigerator & tons of cabinets', '- Backdoor access', '- Hallways provide optimal separation from living and front door', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '- Beautifully maintained 6-unit building', '- Corner lot, one block from Lake Merritt', '- Secure entry & charming entry for dramatic entrance', '- Mailboxes located inside the building', '- Seismically upgraded with off-street parking', '- Maintained greenery and gorgeous tree in front', 'LOCATION FEATURES:', '- 91 Walk Score!', '- One block to Oakland’s #1 attraction: Lake Merritt!', '- Laundromat & café directly across the street', '- One half block to the Cleveland Cascade Steps', '- A short walk to Lakeshore Avenue and Grand Avenue shops & restaurants', '- Close to AC Transit lines, 580 and 880 freeways & Downtown Oakland', 'LEASE TERMS:', 'Rental Amount: $2,895 per month (1 year lease)', 'Security Deposit: $3,500', 'Tenant pays PGE', 'Owner pays Water and Garbage', 'Pets under 20 lbs OK with additional $500 deposit', 'Street parking', '700+ Credit Score Required', 'CONTACT', 'Vanessa Klein, DRE #02031653', 'Text:', 'show contact info', '***PLEASE CONTACT VANESSA DIRECTLY***']
